QuestData.Title: Sparks of Life: Ohn'ahran Plains
QuestData.Description:
The Ohn'ahran Plains are overflowing with energy, $n, and the lands teem with beasts.
Now is the time to join in the hunt, to revel in the bounty, and earn glory for yourself.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect $1oa Sparks of Life in the Ohn'ahran Plains, while in War Mode.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Fieldmaster Emberath in Valdrakken.
